title: Hello Neighbor 2: The Reckoning
description: Hello Neighbor 2: The Reckoning is a fangame to a video game franchise, Hello Neighbor, made by Eclipse Creations. This fangame is a horror-stealth strategy puzzle game, where every decision will have an impact on your gameplay, and story. You will be playing as a local journalist, named Quentin, while facing multiple AIs at the same time, both inside their properties, and outside. You can make some extra money by having a night shift at the abandoned Golden Apple Amusement park, while facing some risk. The money then can be spent on tools, and other items. Sounds like a casual Hello Neighbor game, with some story mechanics? Well, think again, cuz you will have to plan things out to gain success, and think twice before running in.This fangame isn't trying to "remake" Hello Neighbor 2, this is an image of ours that we want to put in the world of Hello Neighbor. Every encounter might not be different, but you'll need a different strategy against each AI.
